ygData.subject: Re: Fashion (was: armor)
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree that fashion is a must. I am a high elf female and my graphic looks like this: No head gear showing of the beatiful chiseled features and long blonde
ygData.messageBody:
I agree that fashion is a must.

I am a high elf female and my graphic looks like this:

No head gear showing of the beatiful chiseled features
and long blonde hair :)Bronze breastplate with banded
leggings creating a decent looking mix of orange and
black skirt with jewels. Bare arms(bracelets) and
black gloves(leather). Golden boots(banded). One
handed mace(ssol) and a book(testament of vanear).
I get many compliments on my looks, which is exactly
what I am striving for since I am playing a very vain,
superior acting cleric that always helps those less
fortunate than herself, which is everybody. (what a
sentence:))

Eylena 19th circle priestess of Tunare


--- Curtis Bennett <die_kluge@...> wrote:
> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> I have mostly ringmail and banded with leather boots
> and armbands
> (mostly because of the weight limits of a strength
> of 75). But my
> small ringmail shirt is ac 12 and someone wanted me
> to wear a lockjaw
> hide vest that they had acquired. The ac was the
> same, but the vest
> gave me a +5 to my stamina (not that I care), but I
> chose not to wear
> it and keep my ringmail because the vest looked like
> leather and I
> prefered the look of the ringmail, +5 stamina or
> not. :)
